name: Cartel (itch) (gvarados, Diomonder)
description:
Oh no! The Cartel is out of control! Their Goons are producing illegal substances!

You play as the legendary El Bandito. Your mission is to defeat the Cartel Goons and stop the production of illegal substances.

Because the Cartel's illegal substances has contaminated the air, El Bandito has enhanced physical endurance and occasional out of control movement patterns.

Controls:

  • A and D - Walk
  • Space or W - Jump
  • Shift or S - Prone
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Esc - Exit
  • F1 - Restart Game
  • F2 - Show Controls
  • F3 - Toggle Music

Credits:

  • Art & Level Design
    • Diomonder
  • Programming & Sound
    • Gvarados
  • Gun/Door sounds & Trophy image are CC0 and not made during the jam!
